item.title: The ||kuken and ostrich feathers
item.summary: The name of the barblet (||kuken) on the stems of arrows that catch in the flesh of the shot animal.
item.comments: 1) See also The ||kuken and Feathered arrows and poison and Arrow-making, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-31
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
